title: SVNIT Notification 2025 - Walk-in interview for 02 Senior Project Engineer-I/II Posts
description: The Sardar Vallabhabhai National Institute of Technology (SVNIT) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Senior Project Engineer Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M.E./M. Tech, B.E./B. Tech in Civil Engineering can apply for the SVNIT Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentione...
